content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research.
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at positions (Boiler: -6.0, 24.5; Offshore Pump: -9.5, 24.5; Steam Engine: 2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); current status: NO_FUEL.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction.
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation with connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); current status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”].
- Pipeline Network: Repeated two‐segment pipeline connection attempts have been made using fluid_system IDs groups:
  • [2172, 2215, 2258, 2301, 2344, 2387, 2430, 2473]
  • [2516, 2559, 2602, 2645, 2688, 2731, 2774, 2817]
  • [2860, 2903, 2946, 2989, 3032, 3075, 3118, 3161]
  • [3204, 3247, 3290, 3333, 3376, 3419, 3462, 3505]
  • [3548, 3591, 3634, 3677, 3720, 3763, 3806, 3849] (new attempts)
  
Connection remains incomplete.

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• PipeGroup Availability and Merge Failures:
   - Validate that a working PipeGroup is available before initiating pipeline connections. Repeated failures with fluid_system IDs [2172, 2215, 2258, 2301, 2344, 2387, 2430, 2473]; [2516, 2559, 2602, 2645, 2688, 2731, 2774, 2817]; [2860, 2903, 2946, 2989, 3032, 3075, 3118, 3161]; [3204, 3247, 3290, 3333, 3376, 3419, 3462, 3505]; and [3548, 3591, 3634, 3677, 3720, 3763, 3806, 3849] highlight the need for pre-checking the fluid network’s readiness.
   
• Pipe Placement Obstructions:
   - Ensure all target connection endpoints are unobstructed before attempting pipe placement.
   
• Multi‐Segment Pipeline Connection Challenges:
   - Verify that intermediate waypoints precisely align with both the source and target endpoints for successful two‐segment pipeline connections.
   
• General Connection and Repositioning:
   - Confirm that both source and target endpoints are within allowed ranges and free from obstructions prior to initiating any connection.
   
• Steam Engine Pipeline Connection Attempts:
   - Repeated two‐segment pipeline connection attempts to the steam engine have been aborted due to the absence of a valid working PipeGroup. Double-check that the steam engine’s fluid input and connection points are correctly configured, and ensure nearby PipeGroups are operational before attempting a connection.
